TopicTitle: What is your ksp save(s) named?

Articles.Content:
People call their saves alot of stuff, i have about 6 saves (if i remember right)

Called :

NO CHEATING - Career

A bit more serious - Sandbox

WE NEED MORE SERIOUSLINESS! - Sandbox

Apocalyspe challenge (for a ksp challenge) - Sandbox

Vido (i do not know why i named it that) - sandbox

THAT SHIP IS ON FIRE! - Career

What's your save(s) called, i want to know

Space Junk Industries - Sandbox

Space Junkers - Career

Sandbox.

Stupid stuff-testing.

Career.

I'm not very creative when it comes to names.

Sandbox- Trial and Error

Sandbox- Done Goofed; accidental let a probe run out of charge, edited it to have electricity, I done goofed.

Matthanian Space Initiative - Sandbox

Matthanian Space Program - Career

29112013 - 0.22 Sandbox save

19012014 - 0.22 Sandbox save (dedicated to perform a Eve return trip)

Sandbox - Sandbox

Career - Career

Chase - Sandbox

Cahier - Career

(roughly translates to booklet in french)

My past save file names (0.20):

FBP - Sandbox, all-in-one (insanity and general space missions)

Flixxbeatz - Sandbox, career-ish

Bixxfleatz - Sandbox, testing and trying things

[NS] - Sandbox, career-ish, organized (save file used to film the now-defunct [NS] Videoseries)

Kerbal Space Program is my Sandbox, and Kereer Space Program is my Career.

I'm so original.
I usually name my sandbox "Campaign", but this time around I called it "Fun Times". My career save is "Career Thing" and I only play it while drunk.

Sandbox - Testbed

Career - Was default ae, a couple random buttons after default so it wouldn't get overwritten when I started another save and was too lazy to rename it. Now my career mode is named Hello World, after the result of the first code anybody is taught to do.

Unimaginatively, it's just "Kay Career."

Career being quite the operative word.

I did have a sandbox mode save for mucking about with, but got rid of it once I'd unlocked the tech tree.

default-sandbox

default1-career

defaultjdf-for guests

Edited January 20, 2014 by thunderstar

Career

default

default2 [or default 1, not sure which]

Originality

Career - Kasa

Sandbox - default

Career - Boldly Go

Sandbox - Playin' Around

Sandbox-Artemis Operative

Sandbox-Odyssey Initiative

Career-Solaris Project

Career-Altair Aerospace

Career-Flashpoint Corporation

Everything's a bit fuzzy. I'll probably do an AAR explaining everything soon.

West Korean Aerospace - Career

Because one of the Koreas has to have a big space program.
"Buttmunch Alliance" - my one and only 0.23 career save

With my username and the Kerbal style of putting K's in front of everything I'm often in danger of hitting that unfortunate triple K acronym so I have to be careful!

My standard career is called KatKareer (I wanted Kat's Kerbal Kareer but...u know)

My Sandbox is called KitKat

(I also have AirCareer which is a pretty unimaginative name for my aircraft only career).

My Career save is named: Space Reduction Inc.

Sandbox: Config Free Space (I use sandbox to set up mods before going into career)

Career mode! -Career

o_O -Sandbox for testing things and general messing around

Mythy Kerman - Sandbox, main save

_23! _D - Sandbox, tests to see if mods work before using on other saves. It was .23! before KSP changed it.

21 Gun - Sandbox, My save I started when .21 was released and broke previous saves

Bean - Sandbox, I usually use my name in all "Name your thing" fields, so habit.

Bruceton - Career, I also go by Bruce, so a city/town/space centre would be Brucetown (Bruceton)

FPS Test - Sandbox, for doing the CPU test on that thread, keeping any other flights from possibly interfering with the test.

Raptop - Campaign (and before that sandbox)

Testium - Sandbox (in honor of the now removed resource)
